title: Microsoft's digital assistant Cortana coming to India
text:
Sep 02, 2015, 08.15 AM | Source: IBNLive.com Microsoft's digital assistant Cortana coming to India The feature will be rolled out as an optional download to Insiders (early testers) on the Windows 10 Insider Preview builds 10532+. M icrosoft is finally bringing its much-awaited digital voice assistant Cortana to India. The software giant announced new regions including India, Japan, Australia, and Canada where the digital assistant will now be made available. 
The feature will be rolled out as an optional download to Insiders (early testers) on the Windows 10 Insider Preview builds 10532+. 
In its official blog, Microsoft notes that an early version in English for Insiders in India is also available which will be updated with improved voice later this month. 
With its latest Windows 10 platform, the company had also announced that it will make its digital voice assistant available in more languages and optimised to understand local dialects, phrases and accent. 
As the feature is still being constantly tweaked based on user feedback for more regional support, it is to be noted that Cortana in India isnâ€™t immediately available to the general users, but extended only to the early testers. 
The company will soon be making it available to the general users and later this year it will be made available to Windows Insiders in Brazil and Mexico, and in French in Canada.
